name: European Federation of Animal Science
goal:
The European Federation for Animal Science or EAAP is an international non-governmental organization which aims to improve the knowledge and the dissemination of research results of domestic animals farming.

The declared aim of the association is to: “promote the improvement, organization and enlightened practice of animal production by scientific research, the application of science and co-operation between the national animal production organisations, scientists and practitioners of member countries”.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Participate to EU supported projects (currently Horizon 2020 and still FP7) for dissemination and coordination. Participating to the High Level Steering Board of the European Innovation Partnership "Agricultural Productivity and Sustainability"
